item.title: 美利坚又出事了[0-50]
item.description:
美利坚又出事了 9 killed in Ohio in second U.S. mass shooting within 24 hours. At least nine people were killed and 26 were injured in Dayton, Ohio. This is the second mass shooting in the U.S. in less than 24 hours. (Derek Myers via Storyful)
https://www.washingtonpost.com/nation/2019/08/04/nine-fatally-shot-dayton-including-suspect-day-after-mass-shooting-texas/?utm_term=.21d91ec63595
item.content:encoded:
激萌的萝莉:
美利坚又出事了
9 killed in Ohio in second U.S. mass shooting within 24 hours. At least nine people were killed and 26 were injured in Dayton, Ohio. This is the second mass shooting in the U.S. in less than 24 hours. (Derek Myers via Storyful)
https://www.washingtonpost.com/nation/2019/08/04/nine-fatally-shot-dayton-including-suspect-day-after-mass-shooting-texas/?utm_term=.21d91ec63595

遗尿:
https://bbs.saraba1st.com/2b/thread-1851232-1-1.html

Alexmacau8:
村通网

钢琴男:
也就慢半天嘛不要太严厉

にまぴ:
泥潭巨魔是真的爱阴阳怪气

蕾麦黛丝:
每年因枪击死几万人，见怪不怪

佐塚間桐:
慢半天的新闻没什么好嘲讽的，泥潭有些人也是，慢一天就开始说上网冲浪

考茨基:
始皇帝驾崩了！

休達:
中文的消息都满地都是了，还转个英文的

队長:
这是美帝的一部分

梁皇无忌:
还以为一天之内来两次
—— 来自 samsung SM-G9550, Android 9上的 S1Next-鹅版 v2.1.2

rubicon:
又出事了

lexi:
梁皇无忌 发表于 2019-8-5 00:12
还以为一天之内来两次
—— 来自 samsung SM-G9550, Android 9上的 S1Next-鹅版 v2.1.2
真的一天之内两次了啊

lilyblack:
鹅害鹅

大哀之君:
你醒啦
-- 来自 能搜索的 Stage1官方 Android客户端
